title: Animation debbuger
body: Provide a timeline like in Flash or Expression that allow me to verify CSS animations, how they work on current page, etc. I just wan't to enable some CSS that start animation, pause animation, check current CSS values, and resume

comments.body: I think in terms of animation, before we start coding we have  to think of the physics first. How do we want to object to move and what is the purpose for it. Does this object deserve to move in a certain way? how fast or slow we need to animate the object? is the object interacting with another object or is it interacting alone with the user? once we have answer those question we certainly know how to properly animated like we used to do it in Flash
